,,, 1GbE Transceiver;Marvell;88E1510;M, 88E1510-NNB2, N02P470.14JW, 1630 A0S, SG;1; ,,, 1Gbps G.hn Baseband AFE;Marvell;88LX2718;M, 88LX2718-NAX2, G0SF741.4JW, 1615 A1E, TW;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = ComtrendXXXX_2.4GHz, ComtrendXXXX_5GHz |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 08/29/2017 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Celeno;CL2200;Celeno, MediaTek, CL2200, 1635-BMAL, ETPAFX26; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "50XX14-473" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. There appears to be an internal GbE connection between the two CPUs
handled by the [[Marvell]] 88E1510 and a second [[Atheros]] AR8035-A chip. [http://investor.marvell.com/phoenix.zhtml?c=120802&p=irol-newsArticle_print&ID=1888574 ''News Release: G.hn Silicon to Power Connectivity'' on '''Marvell'''] *[[Marvell]] 88LX3142, MAC/BBP G.hn; *[[Marvell]] 88LX2718/88LX2720, AFE G.hn; *[[Marvell]] 88E1510/88E1512, Gigabit PHY; ==Pictures==
